original_text: Yes, punish the people of that city. Do to them the same things that they have done to others. Punish them with twice the bad things that they themselves have done. She caused people to drink pain from her cup. Now make her drink twice as much pain for herself! Yes, punish the people of that city. Do to them the same things that they have done to others. Punish them with twice the bad things that they themselves have done. She caused people to drink pain from her cup. Now make her drink twice as much pain for herself! Yes, punish the people of that city.
korean_text: 그가 준 그대로 그에게 주고 그의 행위대로 갑절을 갚아 주고 그가 섞은 잔에도 갑절이나 섞어 그에게 주라

sentences.original_text: Yes, punish the people of that city.
Do to them the same things
that they have done to others.
Punish them with twice the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 나쁜 일들의 두 배로 그들을 벌하십시오

sentences.original_text: She caused people to drink pain
Now make her drink twice as much pain
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그녀에게 두 배의 고통을 마시게 하십시오

sentences.original_text: Yes, punish the people of that city.
